original_text: They began this work on the first day of the first month. On the 8th day of the month they reached the entrance room of the temple. They worked to make the temple a holy place for eight more days. On the 16th day of the first month they had finished the work.
korean_text: 첫째 달 초하루에 성결하게 하기를 시작하여 그 달 초팔일에 여호와의 낭실에 이르고 또 팔 일 동안 여호와의 전을 성결하게 하여 첫째 달 십육 일에 이르러 마치고

sentences.original_text: on the first day of the first month
On the 8th day of the month
they reached the entrance room of the temple
They worked to make the temple a holy place
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 성전을 거룩한 곳으로 만들기 위해 일했습니다

sentences.original_text: On the 16th day of the first month
